title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: When selecting both P1 and P2 projects, it is observed that the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project option is not visible.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2 projects, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project option is not visible.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2 projects, both the Open Project and Close Project options should be available.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below:
1. Create two projects named P1 and P2.
2. Select P2 project.
3. Attempt to close the P2 project from the menu.
